0.quote: "One option is no option. Two options is a dilemma. Three options is a choice."

1.quote: "And though each habit means relatively little on its own, over time, the meals we order, what we say to our kids each night, whether we save or spend, how often we exercise, and the way we organize our thoughts and work routines have enormous impacts on our health, productivity, financial security, and happiness."

2.quote: "Far better is it to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure… than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy nor suffer much, because they live in a gray twilight that knows not victory nor defeat."

3.quote: "Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly."

4.quote: "Don’t say to yourself that you’re going to make the greatest wall ever made. Set one brick at a time as perfectly as you can. Do that every day, and soon you will have a wall."

5.quote: "We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we’re curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths."

6.quote: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple."

7.quote: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it."

8.quote: "The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity."

9.quote: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter."

10.quote: "Courage is the power to let go of the familiar."

11.quote: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek."

12.quote: "Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage."

13.quote: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and loves you just the same."

14.quote: "Never let your sense of morals get in the way of doing what's right."

15.quote: "Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future."
